review_title: An Enjoyable and Flexible Work Study Job at Alvernia University
pros: Easily accessible because it's on campus, you get to work with friends, meet new people all the time. Overall i really like this job because it has flexible hours that work great with my school schedule and it allows me to meet new people all the time and make connections with the campus visitors.
cons: There are not too many cons because its really just talking about your experiences as a student and giving information about the school.

pros: Small place, mostly friendly co-workers.  Generally an easy going place to work as long as you can say yes.
cons: Learn to suck up.  Don't try to be efficient.  Remember to give the students their 20% curve because you can't expect them to actually read the book.

review_title: Great job, enjoyed the atmosphere, loved the professors/students/coworkers.
pros:
-Excellent for gaining experience
-Good work-study, flexible hours
-Your boss is more than just a boss, it could be your professor too!
cons: There is a strong demand/supply depending on the topics they need tutors in. If they don't need your topic, chances are you won't be tutoring.

job_title: Food Service Worker in Reading, PA
pros: Weekend and holidays off. You have off when the students have off.
cons: Too many lies and no taking accountability by management. They expect everyone else to clean up THEIR messes and we were not paid nearly enough for all of that
